recipe.title: Fresh Tomato Soup
recipe.description: Smooth, comforting soup made with ripe tomatoes and basil

steps.descr: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft
steps.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by sautéing the onion and garlic in olive oil until they're lovely and soft. You'll know they're ready when they smell sweet and look translucent.

steps.descr: Add tomatoes and cook until they break down
steps.instructions: Add tomatoes and cook until they break down

on_enter.say: Now let's add those beautiful ripe tomatoes. Cook them until they break down and release their juices. You'll see them soften and smell that wonderful tomato aroma.

steps.descr: Pour in stock, add basil and sugar
steps.instructions: Pour in stock, add basil and sugar

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Let's pour in the vegetable stock and add a handful of fresh basil and a tablespoon of sugar. This will balance the flavors beautifully.
Now, let's simmer the soup for fifteen minutes. This will bring all those lovely flavors together. You'll know it's ready when it smells rich and inviting.
Fantastic! Now let's blend the soup until it's beautifully smooth. Be careful, it's hot, so take your time.
Let's give our soup a taste and season it with a bit of salt and pepper to your liking. This is where you make it your own.

steps.descr: Serve with a swirl of cream and fresh basil
steps.instructions: Serve with a swirl of cream and fresh basil

on_enter.say: Time to serve up! Pour the soup into bowls, add a swirl of double cream and a few fresh basil leaves on top. Enjoy your homemade tomato soup!

notes.text:
Use the ripest tomatoes for best flavor
Roast tomatoes first for deeper flavor
Perfect with grilled cheese sandwiches
